name: Chernobyl Trap
description:
Chernobyl Trap is first person shooter where you play for survived pilot of fallen helicopter. Your mission is simple: go to evacuation point. But can you do it and not die?

Key Features

  • Firearms and melee weapons.
  • Frantic Arcade-Style Action.
  • Autosave on level changing.
  • Dynamic day-night cycle and weather.
  • Breakable crate.
  • Key bindings are changeable.
